description:
FEATURES:
• Yes, the very classic 8-Ball!
• Pool hall on your Nintendo Switch™!
• Realistic gameplay!
• Various game modes!
• Beautiful design!
• Professional tournaments!
• Different cues!

DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the very best, classic eight-ball pool!
Aim carefully and hit the cue ball perfectly!

Play at different tables around the world with different stakes and prizes. 
Take part in tournaments and get great prizes.

The more you win the more you earn.
Spend on new cues and avatars!
Be smart and boost your skill to reach to the top.

Become the world champion!
name: Pool Pro GOLD
intro: The classic eight-ball pool for your Nintendo Switch™! Play against the best in a quick match or tournaments. Play, win and unlock new equipment.
